title: React Components
description: Explore and test the @qazuor/qzpay-react components with live playground data.

overview.packageDescription: React components and hooks for QZPay billing integration
overview.prerequisitesWarning: Create some plans and prices first to see the components in action. Go to Catalog → Plans to get started.

descriptions.pricing-table: Display pricing plans with subscription options
descriptions.subscription-status: Show customer's subscription details and actions
descriptions.entitlement-gate: Conditionally render content based on feature access
descriptions.limit-gate: Gate content based on usage limits

customerSelector.label: Select Customer
customerSelector.noCustomers: No customers yet. Create customers in Simulate → Customers first.

demos.selectCustomer: Select a customer above to see the component in action.

pricingTable.title: PricingTable Component
pricingTable.description: Displays your plans and prices in a beautiful pricing table format. Users can select a plan to subscribe.
pricingTable.noData: Create plans and prices first to see the pricing table.

subscriptionStatus.title: SubscriptionStatus Component
subscriptionStatus.description: Shows the customer's active subscription with details and action buttons (cancel, pause, resume).
subscriptionStatus.noSubscription: This customer has no active subscription. Create one in Simulate → Subscriptions.

paymentForm.title: PaymentForm Component
paymentForm.description: A form for collecting payment information. In mock mode, use test card numbers from the Setup page.

invoiceList.title: InvoiceList Component
invoiceList.description: Displays a list of customer invoices with status, amount, and actions (pay, download).
invoiceList.noInvoices: This customer has no invoices yet. Invoices are created when subscriptions are billed.

entitlementGate.title: EntitlementGate Component
entitlementGate.description: Conditionally renders content based on whether the customer has access to specific features (entitlements).
entitlementGate.noEntitlements: No entitlements defined. Create entitlements in Catalog → Entitlements first.
entitlementGate.locked: Access denied - upgrade to unlock this feature
entitlementGate.unlocked: Access granted - this feature is available

limitGate.title: LimitGate Component
limitGate.description: Gates content based on usage limits. Shows content when user is within their allowed quota.
limitGate.noLimits: No limits defined. Create limits in Catalog → Limits first.
